ç›¸å…³è¯„è®ºç¤ºä¾‹: The 360Â° capture is stunning, the stabilization is top-notch, and the image quality is seriously impressive

Normal cameras only record what you're pointing at, something happens next to you and you're not pointing to it, you've missed the moment and it's not coming back. This camera ensures that never happens again
I love this camera the video footage is great I really love the 360 Lens you get every angle without missing anything
The ability to capture from all angles is amazing, the video quality is astounding for what it is
It captures everything around you, even myself. Noise reduction is solid! Wind noise is way less than I expected
As a motorcyclist this is the best camera on the planet, 360 angels with one can capture all the beauty and anything that you want to record
I always use Insta360's products for motorcycle riding recording, immediately upgraded to this one as soon as it came out!
The X5's wind noise reduction is witchcraft at highway speeds. Just did an test run and the audio actually captures my pipes' growl without that ear-splitting wind howl
Love to be able to record my travels on motorcycle for my safety. Great quality filming with great App to edit videos
All my rider buddies use Insta360 cams and it's easy to unaderstand why. Instead of needing a camera to film in both direction, these 5X cameras film everything all at once
The 8K video quality is off the charts. Since it captures everything around you, you can snag every moment of your travels without stressing about changing angles
8K looks insane. Took it out for some rail stuff and the tracking actually followed for once. Footage were smooth and didn't shake like with my old camera
X5 blows me away with its 8K sharpness. details in hiking footage now looks almost lifelike
The 8K footage is so crisp I saw myself blink in real time â€” from behind
Wow. The 8k 360 video is seriously impressive. It looks much crispier than the x3 and other action cams I've seen
The ability to replace lenses yourself is very welcome and a significant enough development in itself to warrant an upgrade
The replacement lens is the most practical upgrade! My old 360 cam's scratched lens meant weeks without it (and $$$ for repairs). Now $30 and 2 minutes to pop in a fresh lens myself
The replaceable lenses have reduced a lot of stress when recording. It is nice knowing that if a scratch happens, it's only a ten-minute or so process
I'm stocking up spares now
The detachable lens design means I can swap in replacements if something bad happens. This durability lets me focus on capturing kayaking and mountain biking without babysitting the gear
Nighttime shooting is no joke with this thing. Took it out for a handheld walk through a dimly lit alley and the footage came out looking superb
The low light isn't perfect but the stabilization is great. I mostly film in the day so it isn't an issue for me
PureVideo is wild!
Where the X3 blurred streetlights into glowing blobs, the X5 kept shop signs crisp and shadows detailed
Thanks to the larger sensors the X5 is able to provide improved low light performance
The invisible selfie stick effect is nuts. The stabilization and editing tools built into the app make everything look cinematic
This camera's AI powered stick removal works like witchcraft. No more awkward pole positioning or editing tricks!
The Insta360 X5 is pure fun! Just extend the stick, toss it over your shoulder, and walk. The hidden selfie stick creates floating "drone-like" angles that wow everyone
I can even grab a better view / shot. Only downside is that, the importing process is overwhelming, especially if you have long videos
makes it look like you had 3 cameras running
The ability to shoot first and frame later is everything. I don't have to worry about missing anything, and I can pull clips in any aspect ratio
You point it in one direction, and it magically captures everything around youâ€”simultaneously! No more worrying about framing the perfect shot or missing a moment
Since it is a 360 degree cam, you dont really need to worry about framing your shot, you can always fix it later on
What I love is that it captures everyone at once - I'm not just stuck behind the camera
The footage is smooth, immersive, and so fun to edit afterward
Even bombing down rocky trails, the footage stayed increibly smooth, way better than I expected
The stabilization is unbeatable on this camera, except by the newest insta360 camera
Great stabilization
The stabilization is insane. No matter what you do, it will always look stable
Took the X5 mountain biking last weekend. Even bombing down rocky trails, the footage stayed increibly smooth
The 8K footage is so crisp I saw myself blink in real time â€” from behind.
8K looks insane. Took it out for some rail stuff and the tracking actually followed for once.
The 8K video quality is off the charts. Since it captures everything around you, you can snag every moment of your travels without stressing about changing angles or camera positions.
X5 blows me away with its 8K sharpness. details in hiking footage now looks almost lifelike.
Wow. The 8k 360 video is seriously impressive. It looks much crispier than the x3 and other action cams I've seen.
I love that i do not have to be intentional about everything that i do with this camera. I can literally set it and forget it and know that i will always be in the frame.

Great stabilization, and powerful AI editing. Perfect for beginners and pros alike.
The low-light performance is genuinely impressive - easily one of the best in its class.

Where the X3 blurred streetlights into glowing blobs, the X5 kept shop signs crisp and shadows detailed.

Now $30 and 2 minutes to pop in a fresh lens myself. I'm stocking up spares now.
Battery life is robust, offering up to 185 minutes of recording in 5.7K, and fast charging capabilities mean you're ready to go in no time.
Took my X5 out on a group ride yesterday and it worked great. I rode for a full two hours and the battery held up the whole time and I still had like 25% left.
Battery life holds up well and it's surprisingly durable.
The X5 has stepped up its game with an extra hour of battery life.
Battery runs about 2 hours and it loops recording if your memory card fills up.
The new AI-powered editing tools in the app make it a breeze to create awesome content.
The camera has a ton of smart features, too many to even list, and they're all awesome.

I purchased the Insta360 X4 on March 26, 2025, and received it on March 31. Everything worked fairly well until May 1, when I brought it to a major police sports event, a high-profile assignment where I was expected to capture key footage. I recorded in 8K 30fps during midday under a sunny sky. To my shock and embarrassment, the camera overheated and shut down just 3 minutes into recording.
Does get too hot and turns off for excessive heat it not fair to pay so much money for that cÃ¡mara

I should note that after my return is completed since I didn't see a similar comment/review. This was my first live action 360 camera, and I enjoyed this camera a lot while I noticed the body of camera is heated when it is on. It was probably over 105 F (40C) since I felt really hot.
Truely a POS in Camera form. From "wont stay connected" to "very slow button response". I dont think I have ever hated a product so much as this camera.
Fun camera but horrible app! If they don't fix the Insta360 app soon. I will return it!!! The app is sluggish and keeps crashing.
Camera has cool features it's too bad the app is so terrible that it makes editing almost imposible. I've had my camera for a week and been trying to edit and upload the same video for days.

Great camera, awful apps. I bought the camera and took it on a tripâ€¦ The battery life is a jokeâ€”nowhere near the advertised 130 minutes.

The shape it came in looks like someone replaced it for their own that was broken and there was no battery

don't buy this, i bought it brand new from here and that thing looked used and one of the cameras was broken

Works great for my son, who does a lot of bow fishing at night.

Absolutely love it! I got the DJI Osmo Action 4 because I saw it on Tik Tok, and absolutely do not regret the purchase. I do highly recommend getting ND filters though. Camera is spectacular for low light videos!
Really Good Camera And Very Durable. Dropped It A Couple Times And Seems To Hold Fine, The NightVision Is Top Notch, if your planning to stream or take videos at night this is the perfect one.
Content game changer!!! This small form factor, robust camera is absolutely worth it. The user interface is a no-brainer, and when paired with the app, it's seamless.
I love this action camera. It is rugged and easy to use. It does not overheat even when I record video footage of over 2 hours.
I'm addicted to it, honestly. I work in construction and this thing is perfect for training guys and capturing progress on jobsites.
The stabilization is rock-solid, even during intense movement like biking or running.
Beautiful image quality, with unbelievable motion stabilization- there will never be a need for tripods with functions like this!
love this camera. use with a chest mount for mountain biking. long battery live and great quality. the image stabilization is amazing as well.
I also love the magnetic quick-release system makes switching angles effortless
The magnetic mount is also nice(which is also on the case that comes with it)
The internal memory storage has already been a lifesaver when I forgot to reload card before heading out
Also love that it's waterproof right out of the box and has built-in storage
I love the front touchscreen, no need to unmount it to change anything
The dual OLED touchscreens are another favorite featureâ€”bright, colorful, and super responsive

Requires an app that bypasses Android security and sends data directly to the Great Firewall of China
This level of data collection, simply to activate a camera, feels invasive and unnecessary
And the USB cover, what you use to charge, has come off. Detached from the camera and impossible to put back
The battery door leaked and the inside got wet
Really nice camera for recording motorcycle rides
I use it to record motorcycle rides to hidden fishing holes and coffee shops on my YouTube channel
Super happy with this little guy. Bought it for real estate pictures and the camera quality is amazing compared to my iPhone
The stabilization is rock-solid, even during intense movement like biking or running.
Excelente, compacta, tiene buena imagen y grabaciÃ³n de audio. No es muy buena para fotos, pero el video y la estabilizaciÃ³n son muy buenos.

Great Action Camera for a bargain compared to the new model action 5 or go pro 13 great for everything except low light I'd recommend the newer models for that. I'm using mine for a motorcycle poetry vlog I have on you tube and the stabilization works perfectly
I bought the Osmo Action 4 to replace my GoPro Hero 11, and it completely blew my mind. It outperforms the GoPro in every way, including low light performance.
Surprised by the video quality in the dark environment!!
Great for games and outdoors. Which I knew the zoom wasn't all too great
Battery life is impressive, especially in extended shooting modes
The battery life is outstanding. Orientation controls for shooting vertical vs. horizontal video work exactly as on most phones
Great battery, premium materials. Microphone quality is also nice. Video quality and night time video recording is great. Value for money.
The AI features you can track you in the frame and follow you on the screen.
Beautiful image quality, with unbelievable motion stabilization- there will never be a need for tripods with functions like this!
Amazing product, easy to use and very compatible with other accessories
First day I used it the seal failed filling with water. Instant return.

Purchased as a gift for my son who free dives. He finally took it out today for the first dive. Worked great until his second dive (usually around 50ft) and it stopped working. Turns out the battery door leaked and the inside got wet.

This camera is not water safe at all. The first time I ever took it to the beach, it died on me. The battery door was secured and closed and I had the magnetic cage over it, so there was no way that water should've been able to reach the battery but it still did.

The product was easy to setup with no issues. After using the Dji osmo action 3 and testing it with a full charge battery. The video and audio recording quality was perfect for my liking, However the Dji osmo action 3 overheated and the camera turn off on 11 percent battery in a hot weather.
Not sure if my the cam I received is defective. It started get hot right after I started recording. Can't even touch the screen cause it's too hot.
This product overheats and shuts down frequently. Mine is less than 3 months old too. Overheats in less than 10m of recording - this was indoors with air conditioning too.

THIS CAMERA REQUIRES YOU DOWNLOAD A DATA COLLECTION APP TO USE. When you buy a product you should expect to be able to use it. Instead, DJI holds your product hostage until you download their app on your phone.

Do not buy this camera or any other DJI product. You will need an expensive phone to register the product after using the 5 skips. They make no mention of needing a phone that's on their compatibility list
was not able to use this product - it requires installing app with absurd license terms. without an app it's not working :(
Not bad if you get your settings right. But the battery it comes with will only last an hour on a full charge.
Camera works phenomenal. Just be careful when buying it. Make sure you get the insurance because battery did not last more than 60 days.

BUYER BEWARE: Device is soft locked (software locked) out of the box. Meaning, unless you OWN or have ACCESS to one of the mobile phone listed on it's very short list of DJI Mimo app compatible phones, the CAMERA WILL NOT WORK.

Interesting little camera, well made and well packaged. However, initial activation was very problematic. The app to activate the camera is not on google play store and must be down loaded from the web.

The camera came missing essential screws to actually lock in place magnetic rod and other attachments. The protective cover lens came cracked. The insides were also corroded with a white powder.
Bought the adventure combo. The package did not come with mounts and charging cable. All I got was a camera, frame, extension rod, batteries, battery case, mount screws and the pads.

Bought this to put on a motorcycle helmet to video when out riding. The picture quality and ease of use is just as good as GoPro if not better.
